doc.title: FMW - Legend Dawns
doc.plot: "Straight Up" John Watanabe, also the host of Urban Wrestling Alliance and radio host for WCFL/Chicago and WXXQ/Rockford, IL, is the host for the American market presentation of FMW Wrestling, a hardcore professional wrestling league in Japan. Among the main event wrestlers for FMW include Hayabusa (seen on the box cover for LEGEND DAWNS video and DVD) and Masato Tanaka. FMW is the Japanese league that during the 1990s, influenced the style of American wrestling leagues like ECW, WCW and WWF.
